name: Anh Tri Flower Apartment
address: 7/236 Au Co, Tay Ho District, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam, 10000
hotelDesc:
Ideal for fun and relaxation, Anh Tri Flower Apartment is located in the Tay Ho District area of Hanoi. Situated only 6 km from the city center, guests are well located to enjoy the town's attractions and activities. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Take advantage of a wealth of unrivaled services and amenities at this Hanoi hotel. To name a few of the hotel's facilities, there are 24-hour security, kitchen, luggage storage, valet parking, car park.

The ambiance of Anh Tri Flower Apartment is reflected in every guestroom. carpeting, clothes rack, linens, mirror, slippers are just some of the facilities that can be found throughout the property. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. When you are looking for comfortable and convenient accommodations in Hanoi, make Anh Tri Flower Apartment your home away from home.

places.name: Benh Vien Lao Va Cac Benh Phoi Trung Uong
